messages.subject: kids close
messages.msgSnippet: My kids are close too.... I have three.. first and second are 21 months apart.  Middle and third are 18 months apart.  I remember just laughing when told the
messages.messageBody:
My kids are close too....
I have three.. first and second are 21 months apart. Middle and third
are 18 months apart. I remember just laughing when told the third was
on her way. I had an IUD, and just couldn't believe it. I was pretty
stressed out, but time helped alot.
I too have a story to share... it's kind of like the flour story. I
remember coming into the kitchen to find my oldest, then 2 or so with
his whole face covered with chunky peanut butter! Hysterical...!
Then there was the time the middle one was probably 1.5 and the oldest
2, and they discovered the oatmeal container, and had that all over the
kitchen floor. They were having a blast. Yes, I have pictures of both.

Time has saved me..... :)
Now my youngest is 3, middle 5, and oldest 7...Life is still crazy, but
much easier.
Ann
